Articles.Content: I’m trying to run KSP 1 on my new steam deck. I can Start the program ok and start to build a simple rocket. However, when I try to add a parachute from Utilities, I can’t get to the utilities button; it is covered by the small flight panel. I don’t know any way to unstick the images.  Any help?

sorry, I have no answer for the OP.

Is there any existing master thread for KSP on steam deck?
